## Prerequisites
Please check the following before submitting:
- [ ] I have searched for [**existing issues**](https://github.com/Inrixia/luna-plugins/issues?q=is%3Aissue) to ensure this is not a duplicate, including **closed** issues.
- [ ] This is a issue for a **Plugin** from the [**@inrixia/luna-plugins**](https://github.com/Inrixia/luna-plugin) repo, not the [Luna Client](https://github.com/Inrixia/TidaLuna) or a plugin from a different repo

## Describe the feature you would like
A clear and concise description of what you want
